name: Supply Chain Protection Tactics
description: Strategies to prevent food and water supply tampering and ensure security in distribution networks.

cards.title: Monitoring for Supply Chain Tampering
cards.description: Detecting disruptions and intentional contamination in food and water distribution systems.
cards.bulletpoints: Inspection checkpoints, tracking supply anomalies, packaging integrity checks

cards.title: Defensive Measures Against Food & Water Sabotage
cards.description: Developing safeguards to prevent malicious alterations in critical supply networks.
cards.bulletpoints: Supply chain fortification, storage security, protective barriers

cards.title: Covert and Overt Protection Strategies for Food & Water Reserves
cards.description: Using both visible and hidden security measures to protect against large-scale contamination attempts.
cards.bulletpoints: Surveillance methods, tamper-proof seals, strategic stockpiling
